member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.DMC.DMC_ErrorMessage
member.summary: This is the string value returned if an error is encountered during the Data Management Card item retrieval process. Typically this only occours if the DMC is not found.

member.name: T:Okuma.Scout.DotNet
member.summary: This class is used to determine details about the Microsoft .NET Framework

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.DotNet.GetNetfx10SPLevel
member.summary: Function Name: GetNetfx10SPLevel Description: Uses the detection method recommended at http://blogs.msdn.com/astebner/archive/2004/09/14/229802.aspx to determine what service pack for the .NET Framework 1.0 is installed on the machine
member.returns: integer representing SP level for .NET Framework 1.0

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.DotNet.GetNetfxSPLevel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determine what service pack is installed for a version of the .NET Framework using registry based detection methods documented in the .NET Framework deployment guides.
member.param: registry key name to use for detection
registry value to use for detection
member.returns: integer representing SP level for .NET Framework

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.DotNet.CheckNetfxBuildNumber(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the .NET Framework build number from the registry and validates that it is not a pre-release version number
member.returns: true if the build number in the registry is greater than or equal to the passed in version; false otherwise

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.DotNet.RegistryGetLocalMachineValue(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Get the value of a reg key
member.param: Name of the key to retrieve
The value that will be retrieved

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.Error.Args.Exception

member.name: T:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker
member.summary: This class can read the licencse file for the Okuma API and check to see if individual license features are valid.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.#cctor
member.summary: Constructor for LicenseChecker class

member.name: F:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.LicString
member.summary: Once class LicenseChecker is accessed, this contains the contents of the Okuma API License file (if it exists, otherwise will remain the default value and `lic_exist` will = null. )

member.name: F:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.ListOfLicenseFeatureItems
member.summary: This is a list of all feature items contained in the license file "okuma.api.lic". The list items are of type "Okuma.Scout.LicenseItem" and contain useful information such as feature name, version, and expire date. If the license file is not found, the value will be null.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.LicenseItemProvider(System.String)
member.summary: Retreieves the license item from the list generated in the constructor using the license file. If the feature doesn't exist, a default item is returned. If the status hasn't been retrieved yet, it is checked at this time.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.CheckLicensesFeature(System.String)
member.summary: Checks the given API license feature
member.param: The feature name as written in the license file
member.remarks: The majority of this method is designed to catch errors before attempting to the check out the feature, as "CheckOutFeatureByReflection" assumes that everything is in place to perform the check.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.CheckOutFeatureByReflection(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Check any Okuma API license feature

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.GetApplicationMajorVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Formats standard "AssemblyVersion" string to only include first two digits.
member.param: Assembly Version: assumes the format "a, b, c, d"

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.ConvertExipreDate(System.String)
member.summary: All of the license files I've seen that expire seem to use Jan. 1st. How ever, I'd assume the same month naming convention is used for other months, if expire date is not arbitrary.
member.param: string from license file of its non-standard date format.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.License_DataApi_L
member.summary: Returns THINC Lathe Data API License object. This object contains the licenses feature name, version, if it expires, when it expires, and it's current status.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.License_DataApi_MC
member.summary: Returns THINC Machining Center Data API License object. This object contains the licenses feature name, version, if it expires, when it expires, and it's current status.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.License_CommandApi_L
member.summary: Returns THINC Lathe Command API License object. This object contains the licenses feature name, version, if it expires, when it expires, and it's current status.

member.summary: Returns THINC Machining Center Command API License object. This object contains the licenses feature name, version, if it expires, when it expires, and it's current status.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseChecker.License_ControlTypeP200

member.summary: Returns Optional THINC API NC Current Alarm License object. This object contains the licenses feature name, version, if it expires, when it expires, and it's current status.

member.name: T:Okuma.Scout.Platform
member.summary: This class just determines Machine and Control type.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.Platform.DetermineMachineType
member.summary: Determines the Machine type based on existance of Data Management Card, OSP files, and contents of DMC.
member.remarks: At this time it is impossible to determine type Grinder (because it doesn't exist yet with P Control)

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.Platform.DetermineControlType
member.summary: Determines the Machine Control Type based on value of 'Type of OSP' key in the data management card. If Machine Type is PC, control type is N/A. If DMC doesn't exist or no match is found, returns ControlType "Unknown"

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.Platform.ConvertToMachineTypeString(Okuma.Scout.Enums.MachineType)
member.summary: Returns a more human readable version of the enum values for MachineType.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.Platform.Machine
member.summary: Returns enum of type 'MachineType'

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.Platform.Control
member.summary: Returns enum of type 'ControlType'

member.name: T:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo
member.summary: This class was built to be a reusable way to populate the about screen with useful information

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.ErrorMessage
member.summary: This is the string value returned if an error is encountered during the file version retrieval process.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.ErrorDateTime
member.summary: This is the DateTime value returned if an error is encountered. The default error datetime is April 4th, 1898.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.AssemblyGuid
member.summary: public GUID property for use in static class
member.returns: Returns the application GUID or ErrorMessage if unable to get it.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.AssemblyTitle
member.summary: Returns the program "Title" / Name. Alternatively, if the title attribute is empty, it will try getting the file name of the assembly minus the extension.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: Returns the application version or ErrorMessage if unable to get it

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.AssemblyCopyright
member.summary: Returns the application's copyright info or ErrorMessage if unable to get it

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.AssemblyCompany
member.summary: Returns the company field for the application or ErrorMessage if unable to get it

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.AssemblyDescription
member.summary: Returns the description of this assembly or else ErrorMessage

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.ProgramInfo.AssemblyBuildDate
member.summary: returns the last modified date of this assembly, or else Vars.ErrorDateTime

member.name: T:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi
member.summary: This class is used to determine the version of THINC API on the target system

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.#cctor
member.summary: Static constructor - retreives in formation on class load.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.GacLatheDataApiExist
member.summary: Checks the Global Assembly Cache for the existance of any version of the Lathe Data API (Okuma.CLDATAPI)

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.GacLatheCmdApiExist
member.summary: Checks the Global Assembly Cache for the existance of any version of the Lathe Command API (Okuma.CLCMDAPI)

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.GacMachineCenterDataApiExist
member.summary: Checks the Global Assembly Cache for the existance of any version of the Machine Center Data API (Okuma.CMDATAPI)

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.GacMachineCenterCmdApiExist
member.summary: Checks the Global Assembly Cache for the existance of any version of the Machine Center Command API (Okuma.CMCMDAPI)

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.GacFlexNetExist
member.summary: Checks the Global Assembly Cache for the existance of any version of the Okuma FlexNet dll (Okuma.FlexNet)

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.p_ThincApiInstalled
member.summary: Checks existance of THINC API files in GAC to determine if API is installed (API files could still exist in the OSP directory although API is not installed...)

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.ThincApiInstallType
member.summary: Detects if the THINC-API "Development" Version is installed by looking for THINC API files in the `THINC API\Bin` folder.
member.returns: bool: If false, but API files exist in the GAC, assume "Basic" install

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.APIVersion
member.summary: Determines the API install version by comparing API Dll versions to known versions for install packages.
member.returns: string: Returns the API install version or else "Unknown:" followed by the versions of CMD and DATA API dlls respectivly.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.InitAPI(Okuma.Scout.Enums.MachineType)
member.summary: Instantiate THINC-API on Lathe or Machine Center using reflection
member.returns: Do not attempt to pass MT other than Machine Center or Lathe or exception will result. If THINC API files are not in the GAC, exception will result.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.MachineName(Okuma.Scout.Enums.MachineType)
member.summary: Get Machine Name using the API through reflection
member.returns: string: the machine name, or string EMPTY if unable to determine.
member.remarks: Only implemented for MT: Machine Center and Lathe.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.SerialNumber(Okuma.Scout.Enums.MachineType)
member.summary: Get Serial Number using the API through reflection
member.returns: string: the serial number, or string EMPTY if unable to determine.
member.remarks: Only implemented for MT: Machine Center and Lathe.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.GetCommonVariable(Okuma.Scout.Enums.MachineType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retreives the specified common variable value using the API through reflection.
member.param: int: the CV number to read (0 is NOT ALLOWED).
member.returns: double: the value of the common variable
member.remarks: Only implemented for MT: Machine Center and Lathe.

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.ThincApi.RegistryGetLocalMachineValue(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Get the value of a reg key
member.param: Name of the key to retrieve
The value that will be retrieved

member.name: T:Okuma.Scout.LicenseItem
member.summary: This class is used by 'LicenseChecker' to store information about features found in the Okuma License file

member.name: M:Okuma.Scout.LicenseItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor for LicenseItem class. Requires that a feature name, version, and can expire?(bool) values be provided.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseItem.Feature
member.summary: License feature name

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseItem.Version
member.summary: Version of license feature

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseItem.Expires
member.summary: False if type = "permanent", otherwise true.

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseItem.Status
member.summary: Result of feature validation check. Value is null by default (before checking)

member.name: P:Okuma.Scout.LicenseItem.ExpiryDate
member.summary: DateTime type which holds the license feature expire date. This value will be Vars.ErrorDateTime by default

member.name: T:Okuma.Scout.thisSystemInfo
member.summary: Convient object for storing basic compatability information. This object is not used by Scout.dll and must be instantiated and populated in the user program.
member.remarks: For comparison with app requirements by SCOUT.EXE

member.summary: The system Operating system

member.summary: API version detected on this machine

member.summary: List of all versions of .NET installed on this system.

member.summary: The Machine Type of this system
